text: Does anyone else sometimes have a hard time getting to the tab on the top of sections?  It would be great if we could see those sections listed in the content tab along with the modules so we can “grab” them easier, especially when they are full width or contain embedded videos and other things that make them hard to access: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Access-to-Section-Column-Row-attributes-in-Content-Tree/idi-p/495458>
Can we get filters arranged by topic (i.e. list filters, string filters, time filters, etc) in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters|filter documentation>???
We are def having talks about how we can re-organize that info for sure. Now worries, this is something we want also :slightly_smiling_face:
